meanings.definition: To gain knowledge or skill by study.
examples: I practiced and learned how to play music.

meanings.definition: A person between 13 and 19 years old.
examples: Most people in high school are teenagers.

images.alt: Photo of a teen holding a smartphone, with another teen nearby.
images.description: Two teens look at the screen of a smartphone. They are both smiling.
images.caption: Teenagers looking at a smartphone.

source.title: Woman Standing Near Man While Carrying Smartphone
source.author: mentatdgt

meanings.definition: A school designed for advanced learning.
examples: You may go to a college or university after high school.

images.alt: Photo of a student at a university.
images.description: A student holding books. University buildings are in the background.
images.caption: A student at a university.

source.title: Woman in Yellow Jacket Holding Red Book
source.author: Andrea Piacquadio

meanings.definition: A room in a school where students are taught.
examples: My English teacher stayed in one classroom, while we moved from one classroom to another.

images.alt: Photo of a teacher and students in a classroom.
images.description: Students sitting at a table, working on computers. A teacher helps one student.
images.caption: Students in a classroom.

meanings.definition: A tool for writing or drawing that is usually made of graphite surrounded by wood.
examples: I like using pencil, because I can easily erase my mistakes.

images.alt: Photo of a pencil surrounded by wood shavings.
images.description: A pencil surrounded by wood shavings.
images.caption: A sharpened pencil.

source.title: Yellow Black Pencil Sharpened Above the White Paper in Macro Photography
source.author: Lisa Fotios

meanings.definition: A smooth surface used for writing on with chalk.
examples: Teachers write important things on the class chalkboard.

images.alt: Photo of a person writing on a black chalkboard.
images.description: A person writing with chalk on a wall covered with a black surface.
images.caption: You use chalk to write on a chalkboard.

source.title: Man Wearing Purple Top and Pants Writing on Chalkboard
source.author: fauxels
